ActJudges Act
SubjectPatricia Mogan ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Murray A. Mogan
PrecisGranting of an annuity to PATRICIA MOGAN, widow of the Hon. Murray A. Mogan, Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, effective March 14, 2011.
